snippet: The defending champion Andrea Petkovic reached the quarterfinals of the Family Circle by defeating Madison Brengle, 6-4, 6-4.
abstract: Andrea Petkovic beats Madison Brengle, 6-4, 6-4, to reach quarterfinals in Family Circle Cup.
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Andrea Petkovic reached the quarterfinals of the Family Circle by defeating Madison Brengle, 6-4, 6-4.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Petkovic Tops Brengle
